text: Absolutely gorgeous. I noticed that you already implemented David Kipping's triangular sampling method for the limb darkening coeffs. Néstor Espinoza also has a <https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2018RNAAS...2..209E/abstract|similar> sampling method for the impact parameter and planet-to-star radius ratio. If you think this would be of interest, I already have it implemented in one of our python codes and would be happy to start making the translation over to here!
